original_text: As soon as he heard Peter say this, Ananias fell down and he died. When people heard what had happened, they were all very afraid.
korean_text: 아나니아가 이 말을 듣고 엎드러져 혼이 떠나니 이 일을 듣는 사람이 다 크게 두려워하더라

sentences.original_text: As soon as he heard Peter say this
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 베드로가 이렇게 말하는 것을 듣자마자

sentences.original_text: When people heard what had happened
